snippet: Nigeria is likely to refer the Islamist militant group Boko Haram to the United Nations Security Council for sanctions, a Western diplomatic source said on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: Nigeria Ready to Refer Boko Haram to Security Council: Source
headline.main: Nigeria Ready to Refer Boko Haram to Security Council: Source

lead_paragraph: Nigeria is likely to refer the Islamist militant group Boko Haram to the United Nations Security Council for sanctions, a Western diplomatic source said on Saturday.
